name: pnp-replace-owner-with-a-different-one
title: CLI - Replace an owner in a Microsoft 365 Group or Microsoft Team
shortDescription: Find all the Microsoft 365 Groups that a user is an Owner of and replace them with someone else.
longDescription: Find all the Microsoft 365 Groups that a user is an Owner of and replace them with someone else useful for when an employee leaves and ownership needs to be updated.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
